Articles.Content: Since they've updated the Mk1 Inline cockpit, you can't really put two cockpits back to back to make a good looking fighter cockpit. Has anyone come up with a passable alternative?

If your not adverse to a little part clipping, i tend to use the m2 cockpit, then stick the mk1 inline inside with clipping, looks the part, not sure it your doing a mk1 plane though.

- Sam
